page.title: 04HOUSING IN THE AREA
page.content: THE AREA IS A SPARSELY POPULATED, RURAL COMMUNITY. HOUSING IS IN THE MAIN SETTLEMENTS OF GREAT BENTLEY,THORRINGTON, FRATING AND THE HAMLET OF AINGERS GREEN. THERE ARE MANY FARM HOUSES SCATTERED THROUGHOUT THE AREA, SOME NO LONGER WORKING FARMS DUE TO THE AMALGAMATION OF FARMLAND OVER THE YEARS. HOUSING IN GREAT BENTLEY ITSELF CONSISTS MAINLY OF TWO LARGE ESTATES OF PRIVATELY OWNED DWELLINGOF DETACHED AND SEMI-DETACHED PROPERTY. THERE IS SOME COUNCIL PROPERTY. THERE IS A NUCLEAS OF OLDER HOUSES, SOME DATING BACK HUNDREDS OF YEARS, SURROUNDING THE ANCIENT GREEN. VERY LITTLE NEW DEVELOPMENT TAKES PLACE OWING TO THE GREEN BELT RESTRICTIONS. FIVE HOUSES HAVE RECENTLY BEEN BUILT, WITH PROVISION FOR A FURTHER TEN.
